articles.title: Chinese Stocks Rebound as PBOC Reinforces Support for Market - Bloomberg
articles.description: Chinese stocks extended gains in the afternoon as President Xi Jinping’s emphasis on technology development and a slew of central bank statements reignited optimism over policy support.
articles.content:

articles.author: Kasha Patel
articles.title: The Sun has reached a maximum period of activity. Expect more aurora, NASA says. - The Washington Post
articles.description: We can expect additional aurora displays and potentially more impacts to technology over the next year or two, according to NASA and the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration.
articles.content:
The sun has put on quite the show for Earthlings over the past few years, and now scientists have confirmed the sun has entered its most active period in 11 years, with more action still to come.
